26.ara-name: كتاب الأشربة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated An-Nu'man bin Bashir: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Indeed Khamr comes from wheat, Khamr comes from barely, Khamr comes from dates, Khamr comes from rasins, and Khamr comes from honey." He said: There are narrations on this topic from Abu Hurairah. [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْحُبُوبِ الَّتِي يُتَّخَذُ مِنْهَا الْخَمْرُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Grains (And Berries) From Which Khamr Is Derived
